name: ad8a3cf43b4099bace9eca272632d298
description:
Each image of the collection represents 1% of the human family categorised by income, individually named as an anonymous hash derived from a randomly generated name. 

Together, they visually represent our diversity, but hide the extreme inequality that characterises human society.

Sales from the collection will be split between global charity Give Well and towards developing an art & journalism platform to raise awareness of the true nature of global poverty.
